description: This file defines a REST API controller for managing friend requests within a social networking application. It includes endpoints for sending, listing, accepting, rejecting friend requests, and retrieving the list of friends. The controller interacts with a service layer abstracted through the IFriendService interface.

classes.name: FriendRequestsController
classes.description: Controller class handling friend request-related API endpoints.

methods.name: Send
methods.description: Handles POST requests to send a new friend request.

methods.name: List
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list pending or all friend requests.

methods.name: Accept
methods.description: Handles POST requests to accept a specific friend request.

methods.name: Reject
methods.description: Handles POST requests to reject a specific friend request.

methods.name: GetFriends
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve the current user's friends.
